description: Structured information describing a coordinate space.

anatomicalAxesOrientation._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ).

defaultImages._instruction: Add one or several images used as visual representation of this coordinate space.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this coordinate space.

nativeUnit._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this coordinate space.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this coordinate space.

origin._instruction: Enter the origin of the coordinate system (central point where axes intersect; 2D: [x, y] or 3D:[x, y, z]).

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this coordinate space.

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this coordinate space.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this coordinate space.
